Class NoNamespaceHandler

java.lang.Object
org.xhtmlrenderer.simple.NoNamespaceHandler

public class NoNamespaceHandler extends Object implements NamespaceHandler
Handles a general XML document

    • getImageSourceURI

      @CheckReturnValue public @Nullable String getImageSourceURI(Element e)
      Description copied from interface: NamespaceHandler
      For an element where isImageElement returns true, retrieves the URI associated with that Image, as reported by the element; makes no guarantee that the URI is correct, complete or points to anything in particular. For elements where NamespaceHandler.isImageElement(Element) returns false, this method may return false, and may also return false if the Element is not correctly formed and contains no URI; check the return value carefully.
      Specified by:
      getImageSourceURI in interface NamespaceHandler
      Parameters:
      e - The element to extract image info from.
      Returns:
      String containing the URI for the image.

      Specified by:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
